description: This will be the first day that we have Adrianna without Mr. Pierce present. She used him as a security blanket, and with him no longer here it is apparent that she is very concerned being left alone with a sadistic trainer. We spend the day working on her confinement fears by slowly building up to a full upper body encasement. She struggles with being fully immobilized, but she learns to settle into the bondage and displays shattering orgasms as she is mounted on top of a sybian.
title: Training Adrianna Luna - Day 3
